transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Namaskar sir, Gaurav baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se. Kaise hain sir bataiye?
Customer: Main badhiya hu.
Executive: Sir aapne kal aapne ek feedback diya hamari team se baat hone ke baad aapne ek feedback diya tha not satisfied ka sir. To jaan sakte hain matlab kya issue aa raha hai kiski vajah se aapne not satisfied diya hua tha sir?
Customer: Um. Wahi to baar baar maine mana kar diya to unhe baar baar tabhi phone aa raha hai follow up aa raha hai calls ke liye na aur kyunki mere pe business aa nahi raha hai to waise bhi mere ko service se main satisfied nahi hu to isliye.
Executive: Okay. Matlab wahi calls jyada aa rahi hai iski vajah se aapne matlab satisfied nahi hai.
Customer: Calls jyada nahi aa rahi business to aa hi nahi raha na. Sirf renewal ke liye call aata hai bas support to hai hi nahi. Kam aana chahiye na kam jab main ab do saal se paise laga raha hu. To wo support to hai hi nahi na.
Executive: To ji wo nahi chahiye.
Customer: To ji wo nahi chahiye.
Executive: To main matlab aapko business IndiaMART se abhi aa hi nahi raha hai kyunki jaise main aapka active dekha proper use vgera leads consume kar rahe hain. Inquiry bhi aapke paas aa rahi hai.
Customer: Aap kya cha rahe hain matlab jo mera main product hai uski leads aa nahi rahi to main paise laga ke lead bhi purchase na karu to kuch to karunga na.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul aap ek baar. Accha ek baar sir batayenge apna main product kaunsa hai kiski leads aapko jyada chahiye jiski hum provide nahi kar pa rahe hain.
Customer: 3D wall paintings hoti hai, Bala painting hoti hai. Science labs ho gayi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Labs vgera ho gaya astronomy labs ho gayi jo bhi listing kara rakhi hai maine.
Executive: Okay. To iski matlab all India hum log deal karte hain na sir matlab agar leads all India ki.
Customer: Pan India kam karte hain.
Executive: Pan India karte hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.

Customer: Wo to expire ho jati hai na aisa bhi nahi hai accumulate karke rahe to hum use use na kare.
Executive: Nahi abhi jaise bilkul main dekho ek cheez aapki hai ki jaise jo leads aapke paas expire ho jati hai dekhiye uska reason main bata deta hu. Ek to do reason hota hai ek to ho sakta hai ki us category mein leads ka generation thoda kam ho raha hoga IndiaMART mein to jaldi sold out ho jati hai. Dusra ye ke high competition ki vajah se log jaldi consume kar lete hain competition usme jyada hai us product mein to sold out ho jati hai.
Customer: Bala painting hai usme limited painters reh gaye hain jo cartoon ka kam karte hain aur wo bhi yaha pe nahi rehte wo bhi bahar rehte hain uski wo painters mere paas hain. To competition ki to baat hi nahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai uske liye aap ek kam kariye jaise aap apne seller panel pe jayenge na sir to waha pe ek option IndiaMART ne dikha hua hai jab waha pe past lead ka ek option aata hai. Usme jo sold out leads ho jati hai na to wo waha pe dikhti hai kaun kaun si leads sold out ho gayi hai. Aap usme ja ke usme I am interested kar diya kariye leads mein. To uska benefit aapko kya milega us tarah ki leads ka thoda flow badh jayega ho sakta hai leads aa rahi hai turant sold out to us tarah ka leads ka ek pattern ban jayega to.
Customer: Dobara batayiye. Aap system se hai matlab system vgera pe.
Executive: System pe boliye. By leads ke system pe jaiye ek baar aap.

Customer: By leads pe aa gaya main.
Executive: Waha pe side mein aapko yaha pe dikhta hoga ek chota sa help balance aapka by weekly balance hai wahi pe past lead ka ek option aata hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Past leads pe ek baar aap click kariye.
Customer: Haan kar liya.
Executive: Ab aapko dekhiye sari sold out wali leads hi dikh rahi hongi. Jo kuch ghante pehle ki leads sold out hongi ya fir ek din pehle jo bhi hongi leads waha pe dikh rahi hongi aapko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Waha pe dekhiye I am interested ka option aa raha hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ispe aap I am interested kariye jo bhi aapke kam ki thi leads ya fir aapko lagta hai sold out ho gayi.
Customer: To isme kya IndiaMART ka pura AI pe work karta hai matlab jis tarah ki leads aap consumption jyada karenge uski leads ka flow jyada rahega jis location pe jayenge us location ki leads ka flow jyada rahega jis product pe karenge to wahi I am interested karne se aapka benefit ye rahega us tarah ka pattern set ho jayega ki aap interest kar matlab aap product mein interest hai to us tarah ki thodi leads ka flow badhega aapke paas. Jo abhi ho sakta hai kam aa rahi ho iske reason kya hoga ki aap users kuch product ki leads kam aa rahi hai aapka main product keval leads ki kam aa rahi hai to aap usko properly consume nahi kar pa rahe honge timely to us leads aur bhi kam ho ja rahi hai.

Customer: To aap yaha se ek to sabse pehle samay I am interested kariye aur dusra kam ek kam aur kariiyega aap jaise aap jab leads consume karte hain na to jaise leads aapko nahi dikh rahi to ek baar aap upar by leads pe ja ke search karke ek baar by leads aap consume kariiyega. Do se teen by leads aap search karke agar consume karenge na to bhi pattern set ho jayega.
Customer: Sir main karta hu bhai kya naam hai maine Bala painting aise hi matlab search karke hi karta hu main uske andar se ja ke but ha ye wali jo aapne baat kahi hai ye cheez mujhe abhi do saal mein kisi ne bhi nahi kahi. Ye baat mujhe abhi pata lagi hai jo aap keh rahe ho na interested wali. Phone aata hai ye sale kar lo wo kar lo.
Executive: Main samajh gaya uske liye main ek baar. Hmm hmm. Tab wo phone. Main ab renewal main samajh gaya ho sakta hai renewal hai thoda regress call bhi team kar deti hai main unko ek baar mana karta hu itni call na kare. Theek hai aapko ek baar proper service ke liye connect kare. Dusra jaise abhi main aapka dekh raha tha aap major cities jo aap dealing karte hain IndiaMART mein Delhi mein aapne sabse jyada leads vgera consume kiya hai. Major aapke nau cities hain matlab jispe aap deal kar rahe hain Delhi, Noida, Ghaziabad, Agra, Gurgaon, Faridabad, Bareli, Lucknow, Ajmer. Yaha ki leads aapne.
Customer: 3D wall painting ki uska hum log pan India kam karte hain kahin pe bhi kam aaye short nahi hai hum log par uski lead hi nahi aa rahi hai na mere paas dikkat ye hai.
Executive: Okay. Ek baar aap by leads by leads mein ek baar search karke upar dekhiye 3D.
Executive: Main bhi sath mein ek baar search kar leta hu 3D wall aapko.
Customer: Wall painting paper nahi. School wall painting keh sakte hain aap use. Bala painting kehte hain use. But sir aapne ye 3D wall ho gaya. Aapne jo yaha pe catalog mein apne dala hua hai product kyunki main abhi product aapka search kar raha tha 3D wall painting services padi hui hai sir.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To hum log sir isme catalog mein wo bhi add nahi hai aapke catalog ye ye wala product ek baar aap apne product pe ek baar jaiye pehle aap.
Customer: Aaj maine bahut sari listing deactivate kar di hai kyunki minimum aaye wo ye keh rahe the ki jab meri baat hui thi kisi se to usne kaha ki aapne shayad bahut sari kar di hai to isliye bhi nahi aa raha aap usko kam karo aisa karo. To fir maine aaj bahut sari deactivate kari hai baith ke na.
Executive: Accha. Nahi nahi jaise aap bol rahe na 3D wall painting to ye wala catalog mein add hi nahi hai iski aapne jo total by leads bhi consume kiye hain wo nau by leads consume kiye hain aapki isme is product ke is naam se 3D wall painting services but ye catalog mein aapke add nahi hai product to ek to sabse pehle aap isko add kariye product uski vajah se bhi leads kam aa rahi hai aapke paas.
Executive: Aap ek baar product mein jaiye product mein aap jayenge na to waha pe aapke active product aapko 36 active product dikh rahe honge five product inactive dikh rahe honge.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough business through IndiaMART.

- Receiving excessive follow-up calls despite refusal.

- Leads for main product (3D wall painting) not received.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using 'I am interested' feature.

- Executive advised searching and consuming by leads.

- Executive identified 3D wall painting not in catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to add 3D wall painting to catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, 3d wall painting, subscription
